module.name: Parking Lot
module.description: Manages parking lot extensions and other options. Parking is a way of putting calls "on hold", and then picking them up from any extension.
module.changelog: *2.4.0.2* create hints for Asterisk 1.4 and above *2.4.0.1* add parking_conf class, support PARKINGPATCH config *2.4.0* Destination registry, it translation *2.1.2.1* bump for rc1 *2.1.2* merge findmefollow/core extension destinations if any *2.1.1* fix pseudo hardcoded path issue (hardcoded form missing global) *2.1* Remove settings on uninstall bug #1597 *2.0.2* Add he_IL translation
